message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. I'm happy to start the negotiations at $2,300,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of what's being offered.
Alice, $2,300,000 is significantly above my budget. I'm interested in this product, but I'm only able to offer $800,000 at this time. Let's see if we can find common ground.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $2,300,000 is closer to the product's true value. To move things along, I'm willing to come down to $2,000,000.  This is my final offer.
